cause.description:
Stressed? To much to handle at work or at school? Just take a sip of delicious alcohol and slip away into a wonderful place.
1. Blacking out is good for the mind, body and soul.
2. Alcohol poisning isn't as bad as they say.
3. Who doesn't love complete loss of their ability to function?
4. Finding taco bell wrappers but not remember eating it, classic.
5. Beer
6. Beer
7. 151
cause.mission: To black out as often as possible.
cause.name: Black Out
